text: Leafy-with-love banks and the green waters of the canal%% Pouring redemption for me, that I do
Pouring redemption for me, that I do%% The will of God, wallow in the habitual, the banal,
The will of God, wallow in the habitual, the banal, Grow with nature again as before I grew.
Grow with nature again as before I grew. The bright stick trapped, the breeze adding a third
The bright stick trapped, the breeze adding a third%% Party to the couple kissing on an old seat,
Party to the couple kissing on an old seat, And a bird gathering materials for the nest for the Word
And a bird gathering materials for the nest for the Word%% Eloquently new and abandoned to its delirious beat.
Eloquently new and abandoned to its delirious beat. O unworn world enrapture me, encapture me in a web
O unworn world enrapture me, encapture me in a web%% Of fabulous grass and eternal voices by a beech,
Of fabulous grass and eternal voices by a beech, Feed the gaping need of my senses, give me ad lib
Feed the gaping need of my senses, give me ad lib%% To pray unselfconsciously with overflowing speech
To pray unselfconsciously with overflowing speech%% For this soul needs to be honoured with a new dress woven
For this soul needs to be honoured with a new dress woven %% From green and blue things and arguments that cannot be proven.
